app.name: NFT Billboards
app.slogan: NFT Billboards - Redefining the Future of Blockchain Advertising

hero.title: NFT Billboards
hero.subtitle: Revolutionary decentralized advertising solution: Permanently mint your ad content on the blockchain, enabling transparent, secure, and verifiable on-chain ad display and transactions

decentralized.title: Decentralized Ad Platform
decentralized.description: Leverage blockchain technology for transparent ad space transactions and management, eliminating intermediaries and ensuring openness and immutability

nftFormat.title: NFT Format Ad Spaces
nftFormat.description: Your purchased ad spaces are stored on the blockchain as NFTs, featuring uniqueness and permanence, freely tradable and manageable

flexibleLease.title: Flexible Lease Management
flexibleLease.description: Flexibly set ad space lease terms, renew or update ad content anytime, adjusting according to your marketing strategy

tech.title: Next-Generation Ad Ecosystem Based on Sui
tech.description: Sui is a next-generation high-performance blockchain platform, providing a solid technical foundation for our advertising system. We leverage Sui blockchain's unique advantages to create a truly decentralized advertising ecosystem.

connectWallet.title: Connect Sui Wallet
connectWallet.description: Click the 'Connect Wallet' button in the top right corner to connect your Sui wallet, ensuring you have a wallet extension that supports the Sui blockchain installed

browseAdSpaces.title: Browse Ad Spaces
browseAdSpaces.description: Browse available ad spaces, view details, locations, exposure data, and prices, and select the location that best fits your marketing strategy

purchaseNFT.title: Purchase NFT Ad Space
purchaseNFT.description: Choose a suitable ad space, pay Sui tokens to purchase the NFT, and the transaction will be directly recorded on the blockchain, guaranteeing uniqueness and permanence of ownership

manageAds.title: Manage Your Ads
manageAds.description: Manage your ad content on the 'My NFTs' page, upload creative materials, set links and descriptions, and update or renew anytime

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Blockchain Advertising Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join NFT Billboards now and experience the new advertising method empowered by blockchain

adSpaces.title: Available Ad Spaces
adSpaces.subtitle: Browse the following available on-chain ad spaces, choose the location that best suits your marketing strategy, and achieve brand display on the blockchain
adSpaces.search: Search ad space name or location

empty.title: No available ad spaces
empty.subtitle: Ad space resources are created by blockchain game developers, please check back later or contact the platform administrator

adSpaces.noNftRecordsDesc: This ad space currently has no NFT history records.

alerts.devOwned: This is your created ad space
alerts.devOwnedDesc: Developers cannot purchase ad spaces they created
alerts.alreadyOwned: You already own an NFT for this ad space
alerts.alreadyOwnedDesc: You already own an active or pending NFT for this ad space and cannot purchase again

errors.notFound: Ad space not found or unavailable. If you just created this ad space, please try again later.
errors.alreadyPurchased: This ad space has already been purchased, please select another available ad space.
errors.loadFailed: Failed to load ad space details, please try again later.
errors.notFoundDesc: The requested ad space was not found, it may have been deleted or not yet created.

myNFTs.title: My Billboard NFTs
myNFTs.subtitle: View and manage your owned billboard NFTs.

connectWallet.title: Please Connect Wallet
connectWallet.description: You need to connect your wallet to view your NFTs.

empty.title: You don't own any billboard NFTs yet
empty.subtitle: Browse available ad spaces and get your first NFT

admin.title: Admin Account
admin.description: Admin accounts cannot hold NFTs. Please use a regular user account.

purchase.title: Purchase Ad Space
purchase.connectWallet: Please connect your wallet to purchase ad space

form.leaseDaysExtra: Please enter 1-365 days, longer lease offers more discount
form.leaseDaysExtraUploaded: Lease period cannot be modified after upload
form.defaultTimeDesc: Uses current time when transaction is confirmed
form.uploadedTimeDesc: Cannot be modified after upload, using system default time
form.ratioGuidance: For best display, prepare ad content that matches this aspect ratio
form.projectUrlExtra: Users will be redirected to this link when clicking the ad
form.priceCalculationFailed: Price calculation failed, please try again
form.uploadSuccessAlertDesc: Ad content has been successfully uploaded to Walrus storage network, lease settings are now locked.
form.uploadSuccessAlertWithCustomTime: Ad content uploaded successfully, will be displayed starting from {{time}}
form.externalUrlAlertDesc: You have set an external URL as ad content, lease settings can be modified at any time.
form.externalUrlSuccess: External URL has been successfully set

transaction.error: Failed to purchase ad space, please check your input and try again.

updateContent.title: Update Ad Content
updateContent.description: Please enter a new ad content URL. This URL should point to an image or other media content.
updateContent.externalUrlHelp: Please enter a valid image or video URL

deleteWarning.title: Notice
deleteWarning.description: You are switching from Walrus storage to external URL. After updating, the original Walrus content will be deleted, potentially refunding some storage fees.

renewLease.title: Renew NFT Lease
renewLease.daysExtra: Enter an integer between 1-365 days. Longer lease periods offer better discounts
renewLease.description: Renewal will extend the NFT lease period. Price is dynamically calculated by the smart contract based on renewal days. Renewal range: 1-365 days.

transaction.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch NFT details, unable to determine storage type. Continuing with renewal operation.
transaction.extendWalrusFailed: Failed to extend Walrus storage duration, renewal operation cancelled. Please try again later.
transaction.renewPartialSuccess: Transaction submitted, but could not immediately confirm the result. Please refresh the page later to see the update.
transaction.renewFailed: Renewal failed, please check your wallet and try again
transaction.renewFailedInsufficientBalance: Renewal failed: Insufficient wallet balance, please ensure you have enough SUI to pay for the lease
transaction.renewFailedUserCancelled: You have cancelled the renewal operation
transaction.invalidPrice: Invalid renewal price, please refresh the page and try again
transaction.insufficientBalance: Insufficient balance! Need {{price}} SUI, but wallet only has {{balance}} SUI
transaction.insufficientBalanceGeneric: Insufficient balance! Your wallet only has {{balance}} SUI
transaction.expiredNft: This NFT has expired. According to contract rules, expired NFTs cannot be renewed.
transaction.expiredNftWarning: Due to contract limitations, currently only non-expired NFTs can be renewed. This NFT has expired, please contact the administrator.

messages.contentUpdatePartialSuccess: Ad content has been updated, but unable to refresh page data. Please refresh the page manually.

nftDetail.notOwner: You are not the owner of this NFT and cannot perform this action

manage.title: Management Center
manage.subtitle: Manage ad spaces and platform settings

errors.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to access the management center. Only registered game developers or platform administrators can access this page.

confirmDelete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this ad space?
confirmDelete.description: This action cannot be undone. Ad spaces with active NFTs cannot be deleted.

createAdSpace.title: Create New Ad Space
createAdSpace.success: Ad space created successfully! Data confirmed

form.name: Ad Space Name
form.locationPlaceholder: Ad space location, e.g.: Main Menu, Game Lobby
form.invalidCustomDimension: Please enter valid custom dimension ratio
form.allFieldsRequired: Please fill in all required fields
form.invalidDimension: Invalid dimension format, please select a valid dimension option
form.delayedDisplay: Newly created ad space may take some time to display, please refresh manually later

errors.notGameDev: Transaction failed: You are not a registered game developer
errors.insufficientGas: Transaction failed: Insufficient gas, please ensure you have enough SUI in your wallet
errors.invalidParams: Transaction failed: Invalid parameters provided to the smart contract, please check if the game ID, location, and dimension format meet the requirements
errors.contractConfigIncomplete: System configuration error: Contract parameters incomplete

myAdSpaces.loadFailed: Failed to load ad space data
myAdSpaces.notGameDev: You are not a registered game developer, cannot view ad spaces
myAdSpaces.empty: You haven't created any ad spaces yet
myAdSpaces.emptyDesc: Create your first ad space and start earning SUI tokens
myAdSpaces.refreshFailed: Failed to refresh ad space list, please refresh the page manually

factoryInfo.title: Factory Object Information
factoryInfo.descriptionText: The factory object is the core smart contract of the platform, containing platform ratio, ad space list, and developer list information

platformRatio.title: Platform Ratio Settings
platformRatio.label: Platform Ratio (%)
platformRatio.currentRatioDesc: {{ratio}}% (When an ad space is purchased, the platform will charge {{ratio}}% of the total price as a service fee)
platformRatio.manuallyUpdated: Unable to confirm update from blockchain, UI manually updated
platformRatio.updateUnconfirmed: Transaction submitted, but unable to confirm update result. Please refresh the page later to see the latest data.

registerDev.title: Register Game Developer
registerDev.invalidAddress: Invalid developer address format, please enter a valid Sui wallet address
registerDev.alreadyRegistered: This address is already registered as a game developer

registeredDevs.title: Registered Game Developers
registeredDevs.removeConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to remove this developer?
registeredDevs.removeConfirmDesc: After removal, the developer will no longer be able to create ad spaces
registeredDevs.notInList: The developer to be removed is not in the list
registeredDevs.manuallyRemoved: Developer manually removed from the list
registeredDevs.manuallyUpdated: Unable to get the latest list from the contract, manually updated
registeredDevs.manuallyAdded: Developer manually added to the list
registeredDevs.updateUnconfirmed: Transaction submitted, but unable to confirm update result. Please refresh the page later to see the latest data.

upload.dragText: Click or drag file to this area to upload
upload.hint: Support for a single file upload, file will be stored on Walrus
upload.requirements: Supported formats: PNG, JPG, GIF, WEBP images or MP4, WEBM, MOV videos
upload.unsupportedType: Unsupported file type, please upload PNG, JPG, GIF, WEBP images or MP4, WEBM, MOV videos
upload.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds limit, maximum allowed is 10MB, current file size is {{size}}MB
upload.ratioGuidance: Please use images or videos with proper {{ratio}} aspect ratio for best display
upload.noWalBalance: Your WAL token balance is 0, cannot upload to Walrus storage

walrusUpload.walrusUpdateWarning: You are uploading new ad content to Walrus. After the update, the original Walrus content will be deleted, potentially refunding some storage fees.
walrusUpload.externalToWalrusWarning: You are switching from external URL to Walrus upload. The uploaded content will be stored on Walrus and storage fees will be charged based on your lease period.
walrusUpload.externalUrlWarning: You are using an external URL. Please ensure your URL is accessible and the content complies with platform regulations.

deleteWalrus.notice: NFT content has been updated successfully. Now deleting original Walrus content to free up storage space. You can confirm or reject this operation in your wallet, it will not affect the NFT content update
deleteWalrus.error: Failed to delete original Walrus content, but update operation completed
deleteWalrus.userRejected: You have cancelled deleting the original Walrus content, but the NFT content has been successfully updated

validation.uploadFirst: Please upload a file to Walrus first

transaction.partialSuccess: Transaction submitted, but could not immediately confirm the result. Please refresh the page later to see the update.

progress.title: Uploading
progress.uploading: Uploading file to Walrus storage network...
progress.signingHint: Please confirm the transaction in your wallet, do not close this page

external.placeholder: Please enter complete external media URL, including http:// or https://
external.note: Please ensure your URL is publicly accessible and the file format is a supported image or video format
external.loadError: Unable to load image, please check if the URL is correct or accessible
external.checkUrl: Unable to load image, please check if the URL is correct or publicly accessible
external.ensureImageUrl: Please ensure the URL points to an image file, not a webpage

price.discount: Price is calculated proportionally to the lease period, longer lease is more cost-effective

messages.invalidAddress: Please enter a valid SUI address
